frameDefinitions: Due to chemical, nuclear, or other reactions, an Explosive explodes, potentially causing damage to the surrounding area.
An Assailant physically attacks a Victim (which is usually but not always sentient), causing or intending to cause the Victim physical damage.
The Creator creates a new entity, the Created_entity, possibly out of Components.

A less-powerful person or group of people (the Activists) engages in an activity aimed to inconvenience or weaken a more powerful person or group (the Institution) to seek redress, in the form of a series of Demands, for the wrondgoings committed by the Instituion.  '
A Mass_theme, generally made up of many individuals, moves from a Source to a Goal with some Path.
A Destroyer (a conscious entity) or Cause (an event, or an entity involved in such an event) affects the Patient negatively so that the Patient no longer exists.
frameExamples: The bomb <t>exploded</t> in the middle of the plaza.
As soon as he stepped out of the bar he was <t>set</t> upon by four men in ski-masks.
The Libyans were <t>generating</t> arms for export.
The workers were <t>striking</t> for better wages and better benefits.
Emails from so-called Nigerian princes <t>flooded</t> inboxes all over the US.
listRoleDefinitions: The <fen>Explosive</fen> releases a large amount of force, destroying itself and causing damage to the surrounding area.
The <fen>Time</fen> when the explosion occurs.
The location where the explosion occurs.
This role is the being or entity that is injured by the <fen>Assailant</fen>'s attack.
The person (or other self-directed entity) that is attempting physical harm to the <fen>Victim</fen>.
This role identifies the time when the <fen>Assailant</fen> attacks the <fen>Victim</fen>.
This role identifies the place where the <fen>Assailant</fen> makes an assault on the <fen>Victim</fen>.
The Creator creates a created entity.
This role identifies the entity that the Agent intentionally creates.
This role identifes the Time when an Agent intentionally creates a new entity.
This role identifies the place ehere the Agent intentionally creates the new entity.
The person or group of people that act out against the <fen>Institution</fen> in an attempt to have their <fen>Demands</fen> fullfilled.
The <fen>Institution</fen> is the company, factory, political party / institution, or entity that yields authority over the <fen>Activists</fen>.

The <fen>Demands</fen> are the guarantee(s) given by the <fen>Institution</fen> to the <fen>Activists</fen> that act to correct or address the issues or state of affairs that were grievous to the <fen>Activists</fen>.
The <fen>Place</fen> is the location where the political action occurs.
The mass of entities which moves.
The place where the overall motion event takes place, thus including Source, Path, and Goal locations.
The Source is the location the Theme occupies initially before its change of location.
Path refers to (a part of the) ground the <fen>Mass_theme</fen> travels over or to a landmark the <fen>Mass_theme</fen> travels by.
Goal is the location the <fen>Mass_theme</fen> ends up in.

This role is used for expressions that indicate motion along a line from the deitic center towards a reference point (which may be implicit) that is neither the <fen>Goal</fen> of the posture change nor a landmark along the way of the moving part of the body.  Often <fen>Direction</fen> is defined with reference to the canonical orientation of the <fen>Mass_theme</fen>, or the orientation imposed by an implicit observer.
When the event occurs.
The spatial setting in which the Mass_motion takes place.
The conscious entity, generally a person, that performs the intentional action that results in the <fen>Patient</fen>'s destruction.
The entity which is destroyed by the <fen>Destroyer</fen>.
The event or entity which is responsible for the destruction of the <fen>Patient</fen>.
This role identifies the time when the <fen>Destroyer</fen> destroys the <fen>Patient</fen>.
This role identifies the place where the <fen>Destroyer</fen> destroys the <fen>Patient</fen>.
listRoleExamples: <fex>The bomb</fex> exploded in the middle of the plaza.
The mysterious fighter attacked <fex>the guardsmen</fex> with a sabre.
<fex>The mysterious fighter</fex> attacked the guardsmen with a sabre.
<fex>As soon as he stepped out of the bar</fex> he was set upon by four men in ski-masks.
Then Jon-O's forces ambushed them <fex>on the left flank</fex> from a line of low hills.
Letters streamed in <fex>all over the country</fex>.
Afterwards, the crowd flooded <fex>away from the ceremony</fex>.
The door opened , and a crowd of people flooded <fex>past me</fex>, into the hall.
<fex>In the main auditorium</fex> people crowded around Orange's newest computer
<fex>The subsequent explosions</fex> leveled most downtown office buildings.

sourceCandidateSpans.text: the Italian Federation of Metal Workers (FIOM)
